tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Australias longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.

Australia is in shock following the terror attack at Bondi Beach that left 15 people dead. In a special episode of 7.30 we look at how the attack unfolded, hear from community leaders and people who were there.

programme.title: News Breakfast
programme.desc: A special early 5am start for News Breakfast with the latest following the Bondi Beach Terror Attack. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you up-to-date news and information, interviews and the days top stories.

programme.title: The Art Of...
programme.desc: "Why are we so fixated on looking good?" Artist Ramesh Mario Nithiyendran seeks answers from photographer William Yang, model and mentor Elaine George, artist Joan Ross and choreographer Kelly Abbey.

programme.title: Death In Paradise
programme.desc: The team investigate a preppers commune when one of their members is poisoned inside a locked bunker. Meanwhile, Neville has a series of adventurous dates with Sophie.

programme.title: Escaping Utopia
programme.desc: New Zealands Gloriavale Christian community has been closeted from the rest of the world for fifty years - but now theres a growing group of leavers fighting to free their loved ones still inside.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Jane Edmanson pops into a historic homestead garden, Sophie Thompson learns how to build a bandicoot bungalow, Tino Carnevale enjoys the Autumn colour in Tassie and we meet a passionate propagator of Wollemi pines.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Nigellas Christmas Kitchen
programme.desc: Nigella cooks a juicy roast turkey with pancetta and chestnut sprouts, gingerbread stuffing, and maple syrup parsnips. This is finished off with Fanny Craddocks gift to the world, a vodka flamed Christmas pudding. (Final)

programme.title: Death In Paradise
programme.desc: The team investigate the murder of an estate agent during the private sale of a picturesque beach and discover the buyers were victims of a scam. Meanwhile, Marlon leads a counterfeit goods case to impress the Commissioner.

programme.title: Hard Quiz Battle of the Networks
programme.desc: Its the Battle of the Networks as TV titans Larry Emdur, Leigh Sales, Angela Bishop and Karl Stefanovic step up to the podiums to defend their home channels honour. Will Tom out-host them all? Its must-see TV!

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Ladybug and her team face Sabrina, now Miraculer.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Marinette sneaks into the Agreste home during a private dinner, only to find out that a supervillain is also crashing the party. Will Ladybug save the day, or rather, the soiree?

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who?
programme.desc: The gang saves Weird Al Yankovic from a dinosaur.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Buttercup takes care of a sick Blossom and Bubbles.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzer has a map and a nose for hidden treasure - especially when its a bone! This time he has unearthed more than he can chew. Shaun and The Flock get stuck in to help discover what he has found.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Theres a big bang in this episode as the doctors reveal the amazing piece of body kit that helps your ears to pop and in Operation Takeover they find out just how tough it is for dentists to perform their first ever filling.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!: Do Try This At Home
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand are back in their kitchen lab! In this episode, the doctors investigate how your body digests fat, and show you how to make bileart!

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Party Animals and Noob Cops Part 3!
programme.desc: This week on GGSP, we review the adorable wobbly multiplayer brawling of Party Animals, plus the Noob Cops continue their investigation and discover a surprising suspect has a hand in all these noob crimes!

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Pestering Prank Caller
programme.desc: When a prank caller targets Ezra and his neighbours, Maudie believes the Inbestigators can track down who is making the mystery calls.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who?
programme.desc: Can the gang survive Steve Urkel and his Urkel-Bot?

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Bubbles becomes jealous of Donnys new friend.

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Shaun decides he wants to have a go at skateboarding and sets about building a skatepark from scrap he finds in the dump. Before too long he gets carried away and suddenly discovers its a bit riskier than he first thought.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon: Homecoming
programme.desc: When it becomes clear that the new generation of Vikings doesnt remember the bond between dragon and human, Hiccup sets a plan to celebrate dragons with a grand Snoggletog holiday pageant.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Have the Bears lost their survival instincts by living in the modern world? Grizz wants to know, so he purposefully gets the Bears lost in the deep forest.

programme.title: Fresh Off The Boat
programme.desc: Jessica pushes the family to settle all debts, disputes and grudges to ensure good fortune for the Lunar New Year. Louis and Evan hunt down some hate mail, and Eddie is forced to entertain his super lame cousin.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Eddy is horrified about Saffys pregnancy and starts having nightmares. Meanwhile, Patsy turns their attention to more important things - the celebrity book club, a must for the season.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: Eddy and Patsy splash out on a weekend of country pursuits. They go fully equipped with a selection of Ralph Lauren 1930s country fashion.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.sub-title: Today For You, Tomorrow For Me
programme.desc: The nationals are back on, and A-troupe and B-troupe face off to decide which team will compete. However, its hard to focus on competition when friendships are on the line.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: When Mrs Fillyjonk embarrasses the Moomins into getting a maid, the Moominhouse becomes much better organized, but at what cost? Moominmamma must decide what matters more - what others think, or staying true to yourself?

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The Farmer discovers his old golf clubs and decides to knock a few balls around in the field, instantly putting his back out.

programme.title: Total Drama Island
programme.desc: Todays challenge involves canoeing, hiking and mountain climbing. Its just like normal summer camp! Except that you canoe over a waterfall, hike through a geyser field and climb the worlds biggest beehive.

programme.title: We Baby Bears
programme.desc: The Bears search for their missing box in a dark and scary cave.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: So Many Birthdays: Steven learns that the Crystal Gems are thousands of years old and decides to make up for all the thousands of birthdays theyve missed.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: The Car SOS team takes on renovating luckless Jeremys forlorn Fiat 850 Spider, but it being one of the rarest cars in the UK, spares are all but impossible to find.

programme.title: Mother And Son
programme.desc: When Arthur breaks both his wrists in a fall, Maggie has to look after the son who usually looks after her... and in the process foils his attempt at instant internet fame.

programme.title: rage FIFTY 2025: Best Of The Rest Special
programme.desc: Everyones a winner on rage with the best videos that didnt quite crack the 2025 rage FIFTY.

programme.title: Adam Hills: The Last Leg Christmas Special
programme.desc: In a seasonal special, Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by special guests Tom Davis and Alison Hammond for a festive special edition of The Last Leg.

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Cleo wonders whether the right team is going to the nationals, and Richelle is brought to breaking point by someone she hoped to never see again.

programme.title: Moominvalley
programme.desc: Moomintroll employs the services of his new friend, a little ghost, to convince Snork Maiden that he is brave. But when his trick backfires dangerously, Moomintroll is the one who needs saving.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The Farmer is preparing for a date! He wants to look his best so its time to dust off his prized hairpiece. Shaun cant resist trying the wig on but loses it while showing off to the flock.

programme.title: Total Drama Island
programme.sub-title: The Truth The Pole Truth And Nothing But The Truth
programme.desc: If spending the day balancing on a pole under the direct sun with no food in your tummy sounds like a fun time you are going to love todays challenge.

programme.title: We Baby Bears
programme.desc: When they realize theyre too small for the rides at an amusment park, the Bears use a magic potion to get bigger.

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: A toy trade between Steven and Onion escalates into epic proportions.

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: Martin and Yvonne Davies family home hasnt found a buyer in 18 months. Phil promises that with some hard graft he can shift their pad. But nobody will be working harder than daughter Emily who has monopolised four bedrooms.

programme.title: Death In Paradise
programme.desc: Florences undercover role takes a dangerous turn when she finds herself in familiar surroundings, amid a murder investigation. In a race against time, can Neville solve the murder?

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: Kai and rival Jedi Djovi team up for a mission.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle takes up bird watching. Using his magic bird book, he spots a Woodpecker taking up residence in the Great Elf Tree. The King is keen for more birds, so is pleased when another makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos watch someone try to build a picnic bench, and when she takes a break to walk her dog, they decide to take over.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.sub-title: Jodi Makes a Boat with Max
programme.desc: Jodi and Nana see Teacher Harriet and Max playing with a homemade boat. Jodi uses things she finds in nature to make one, too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: To celebrate Freddy Foxs birthday the children go on a trip to a Dinosaur Park. With Grampy Rabbit as their leader, they follow dinosaur footprints to find Freddys birthday treat.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Jonathan and Paddington must get their ranger badges but Mr Curry is not happy about having them in house.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Holly shrinks Lucy down so she can play in the Little Kingdom. She has fun flying on Gaston the Ladybird and is invited to a sleepover at the Little Castle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today Peppa is making a quilt for the new addition to the family. Together with Mummy Pig and Granny Pig, they collect old fabric and create a beautiful quilt embellished with memories.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: When the cadets create animals out of rubbish theyve cleaned from the beach, they dub them trash pets and inspire other beachgoers to make their own, but things get out of hand and their treasure becomes trash once more.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Whilst searching for new discoveries a rockfall traps Dad, Cosima and Big Lizard in a cave. Just when all is lost Dad finally discovers a new species!

programme.title: Play School
programme.desc: Emma and Karen enjoy a berry cherry pudding and play a musical dancing game. Theres more music and dance Through The Windows as a family celebrate Vietnamese Lunar New Year, and we see a family choose a Christmas tree!

programme.title: Mixmups
programme.desc: The Mixmups set out on an adventure to be parcel delivery drivers and help the LLB online store owner, but they soon find themselves with a heap of muddled up mail. Can they find a way to un-muddle the mail?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing is at Ammas creche and its his turn to choose the game, Musical Statues. Flop gets the Bingpad going and soon, all the children are dancing like crazy.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Indy thinks shes no good because her model horse looks like a cow, but Calypso encourages her not to give up.

programme.title: Mister Maker Around The World
programme.desc: Find out how to make something space-age thats out of this world in South Africa, discover whether Mister Maker can make a pen pot with a twist, and see what happens when he meets a Mini Maker on an Australian beach.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends: All Engines Go
programme.desc: When Percy discovers that his beloved ducks are about to head south for the winter, he does everything he can to get them to stay. But when Percys plan works too well and the weather gets wintery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends come to school early to have breakfast together. At the breakfast club, they learn about how food gives you energy and talk about their favourite breakfast foods.

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: When an egg cracks to reveal a baby Avocadodon, Ginger and the Pea-Rexes have to find a fun way to lead the energetic baby back to its herd.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Tish, Cori and Tobby are visiting Jeffys house today - Jeffy, unfortunately, is not in a good mood due to a damaged toy. Tish, Cori and Tobby decide theyll work together to cheer her up.

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: The Dream Factory Crew comes together to help Mels father Mikisew when he needs a new idea for his Art and Music Festival art piece. A giant marimba is created to make a fresh and exciting art/music installation.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Walrus Chief
programme.desc: When Pesos precious medical kit is taken, Barnacles and Kwazii sneak into a dangerous walrus colony to get it back - disguised as a walrus!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee shows the Squirrels his private cheese vault, where some of the rarest and smelliest cheeses on Earth are kept - but one of them makes its way into the outside world.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Its the Annual Pontypandy Bread Baking Competition and Hannahs ambition accidentally causes her to spark a wildfire.

programme.title: Play School: Make and Create
programme.desc: Special guest Maddie joins Emma and Kaeng to experiment with different shapes to build a colourful cardboard castle. They test a Roly Poly Musical Masterpiece, and Kaeng shows us around his spectacular sculpture garden!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy and Daddy take Peppa and George for a day out at the botanical gardens. There is so much to see and learn and Miss Rabbit and Mr Rabbit are there to tell them all about it.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Cosima and Big Lizard investigate the cause of Dads mysterious sleepwalking in an adventure that takes them around Proxima and right back home again.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Worried about scuba diving for the first time, Neville runs off in the middle of the night.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Armadylan loses the PJs special jet to Night Ninja.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. But hang on - who does that HUGE teddy belong to? Oh! Thats not a teddy, its Beryl and shes a real bear! She wants to join in the fun too!

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Its the Veg-O-Vision Song Contest, where all the fruit and veggies sing a song and Tomato is particularly excited to take part.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: The younglings track an escaped creature.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The Twins really want a pet, so Nanny Plum sets out to get them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf brings Pippin a hamster wheel, but Pippin runs too fast in it and breaks out of the castle.

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos watch a waiter set a wedding table in a marquee. He places plates and cutlery next to each other. The team then decide to help out.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Daniel is excited to go on a boat ride, but rushes and breaks his toy boat. Grandpere shows him that its good to go slow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington
programme.desc: Drainpipe Dan is on the loose stealing Mrs Browns wedding ring. Inspector Paddington of the yard is on his trail.

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly. The trek goes well until the snails head straight toward the Elf Farm and Mr Elfs cabbages...

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Driving along in Mummy Sheeps car, they spot an old van at the Recycling Centre. With the help of Peppas friends, they make the van colourful!

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: When Pounce falls in the lagoon and gets covered in seaweed, the other cadets mistake him for a swamp monster, and decide they have to capture it.

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: When Twig steals Cosimas volleyball, a chase leads Big Lizard and Cosima to her den, and a happy discovery!

programme.title: Play School
programme.desc: Zindzi and Leah make a colourful, twinkling rangoli and whip up some shaky, spicy eggs! We learn about an Italian tradition, Passata Day, and Through The Windows we see a family celebrating Diwali, the festival of lights!

programme.title: Mixmups
programme.desc: The Mixmups take a holiday from tidying up, only to find that mess has a strange habit of following them wherever they go. Will the Mixmups find "another way" to have a tidy holiday?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing drives his toy car around the breakfast things on the table and accidentally spills krispos all over the kitchen floor.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go sideways when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Mister Maker Around The World
programme.desc: Mister Maker, Scrappz and Tocky find out how to make something prehistoric in South America. In Australia, discover if Mister Maker can make a gorgeous glitter badge. And see whats cooking in a Hong Kong street market.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends: All Engines Go
programme.desc: When a gull builds a nest on Cranky, he refuses to unload Bulstrodes deliveries until the egg hatches, so Thomas and his friends roll in to get the job done!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.sub-title: Mr Potatos Fruit And Vegetable Quiz
programme.desc: Mr Potato visits the school to sing the vegetable song and tell the children about the importance of eating five fruits or vegetables a day. But which team will win his quiz?

programme.title: Ginger And The Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger and the baby Pea-Rexes guide a young Strawberrisaurus to find the courage to perform a special friendship dance that will help them find a lifelong playmate.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: The family are going camping but Tish doesnt want to get her new shoes muddy, which will be difficult when Rosa and Pola tell Tish to look after Bobby.

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: When Moose is too scared to sleep out in the woods with the rest of the Nature Guide Troupe the Crew uses materials they find in nature to build a "roughing-it" doghouse, to help Moose feel more comfortable.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Giant Kelp Forest
programme.desc: When Kwaziis favourite sub, the Gup-B goes missing, the Octonauts journey into a mysterious kelp forest to find it, meeting strange and interesting creatures along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing in the treehouse when they stumble upon a room full of old radio equipment, and discover that Duggee used to host his own show!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy and Sarah try to get the big scoop on who the special guest performing at the Big Pontypandy Festival will be!

programme.title: Play School: Make and Create
programme.desc: Teo and Alex are joined by special guest Eddie in The Make and Create Studio where they use a machine to transform recycling! Teo and Alex upcycle everyday objects in the garden, and Maurice hosts an upcycled fashion show!

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George join Granny Pig and her friends to play at being Vikings. The Vikings are having fun on Grandpa Pigs boat until they realise theyve left their picnic behind!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.sub-title: The Day Ammon Overcame Her Fear
programme.desc: If Ammon gets spooked by a tiny insect, how can she summon the bravery to rescue Cosima and Big Lizard from the river rapids?

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: When multiple emergencies break out on a windy day at Kangaroo Beach, Neville offer help as an assistant medic. Meanwhile, Pounce learns how to kite surf.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Owlette causes a freak asteroid accident and Gekko and Catboy try to help her put it right. But there is more to the accident than there seems when the PJ Masks meet another night-time hero in space, introducing Newton.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: When the Squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. The squirrels make their own musical instruments, playing pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes, but boy are they loud!

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: While hunting for the legendary Lost Candle of Birthdays, Supertato and Tomato are lured into Evil Peas Cake of Iced Doom.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Australias longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.

programme.title: Hard Quiz Battle of the Networks
programme.desc: Its the Battle of the Networks as TV titans Larry Emdur, Leigh Sales, Angela Bishop and Karl Stefanovic step up to the podiums to defend their home channels honour. Will Tom out-host them all? Its must-see TV!

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Know the latest on the days top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: The man who murdered Toyah Cordingley in North Queensland sentenced to life in prison, the heart-stopping moment a skydivers parachute catches on a plane, plus we visit Australias biggest miniature railway. (Final for 2025)

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker in Perth.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Expanse: Nowhere Man
programme.desc: In 1999 a young American dumped his bicycle and walked out into the Great Sandy Desert in remote northern Australia. Why did he go out in the wilderness alone? And how do you search for someone who doesnt want to be found?

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News through the day. We have reporters in more places, to tell you whats happening. Johanna Nicholson brings you the latest news and information.

programme.title: ABC News Hour
programme.desc: Stay in the know with Australias trusted news source. From your neighbourhood, across the country and around the world, ABC News bring you the days top stories and latest news, all verified. Presented by Joe OBrien.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.desc: Senator Jacinta Nampijinpa Price is a rising political star who helped defeat the Voice referendum. The former singer and TV host reveals the private pain that shaped her polarising views and why shes unapologetic.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: The home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the big stories from across Australia and around the globe. The ABCs network of reporters cover important stories and all the news you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. Weve got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Craig Smart.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget, James and Emma hear from the stars of the new Avatar and Knives Out sequels including Sigourney Weaver and Daniel Craig. Hugh Jackman and Kate Hudson tell us about Song Sung Blue plus Zak Hepburn and Carrie Bickmore.

programme.title: Jim Maxwells Ashes Memories
programme.sub-title: 1982 - Border and Thompsons almost miracle at the MCG
programme.desc: Legendary commentator Jim Maxwell counts down his top six Ashes moments from his more than 50-year career. In third spot, he and Corbin Middlemas revel in Allan Border and Jeff Thompsons almost miracle at the MCG in 1982.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart in Perth.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Culture By Design
programme.desc: How can design help us live more sustainably? Learn how environmentally-focused architects and furniture designers in Delhi, India and Jakarta, Indonesia, are creating groundbreaking and impactful designs.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News through the day. We have reporters in more places, to tell you whats happening and why it matters. Ros Childs brings you the latest news and information.

programme.title: ABC News Hour
programme.desc: Stay in the know with Australias trusted news source. From your neighbourhood, across the country and around the world, ABC News bring you the days top stories and latest news, all verified. Presented by Joe OBrien.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.sub-title: Heartfelt - Col Clausen And Laura Aisbett
programme.desc: When Col and Laura met, they were both grieving the sudden death of a cherished spouse. They soon had to confront a thorny question - when is an appropriate time is to find love after loss?

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: The home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the big stories from across Australia and around the globe. The ABCs network of reporters cover important stories and all the news you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. Weve got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Jade Barker.
